Package tp_ed.capturetheflag.game

Class Bot

java.lang.Object
tp_ed.capturetheflag.game.Bot
public class Bot extends Object
The Bot class represents a bot in the game. It stores information the bot's current location, the player it is associated with, the movement algorithm it uses, the bot number and a unique identifier.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Bot(int location, String botIdentifier)
    Constructs a new bot with a specified location and unique identifier.
    Bot(Player player, int location, Algorithm algorithm, int botNumber)
    Constructs a new bot associated with a player, specified location, algorithm, and bot number.
